ayah_english: When the sky is split asunder
When the sky is split asunder
When the sky is split asunder
And has listened to its Lord and was obligated
And has listened to its Lord and was obligated
And has listened to its Lord and was obligated
And when the earth is spread
And when the earth is spread
And when the earth is spread
And has cast out what (is) in it and becomes empty
And has cast out what (is) in it and becomes empty
And has cast out what (is) in it and becomes empty
And has cast out what (is) in it and becomes empty
And has listened to its Lord and was obligated
And has listened to its Lord and was obligated
And has listened to its Lord and was obligated

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-insanu innaka kadihun ila rabbika kadhan famulaqihi
ayah_english: O mankind Indeed, you (are) laboring to your Lord (with) exertion and you (will) meet Him

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-insanu innaka kadihun ila rabbika kadhan famulaqihi
ayah_english: O mankind Indeed, you (are) laboring to your Lord (with) exertion and you (will) meet Him

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-insanu innaka kadihun ila rabbika kadhan famulaqihi
ayah_english: O mankind Indeed, you (are) laboring to your Lord (with) exertion and you (will) meet Him
Then as for (him) who is given his record in his right hand
Then as for (him) who is given his record in his right hand
Then as for (him) who is given his record in his right hand
Then as for (him) who is given his record in his right hand
Then as for (him) who is given his record in his right hand
Soon his account will be taken an account easy
Soon his account will be taken an account easy
Soon his account will be taken an account easy
Soon his account will be taken an account easy
And he will return to his people happily
And he will return to his people happily
And he will return to his people happily
And he will return to his people happily

ayah: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
ayah_translit: wa-amma man utiya kitabahu waraa zahrihi
ayah_english: But as for (him) who is given his record behind his back

ayah: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
ayah_translit: wa-amma man utiya kitabahu waraa zahrihi
ayah_english: But as for (him) who is given his record behind his back

ayah_translit: wa-amma man utiya kitabahu waraa zahrihi
ayah_english: But as for (him) who is given his record behind his back

ayah: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
ayah_translit: wa-amma man utiya kitabahu waraa zahrihi
ayah_english: But as for (him) who is given his record behind his back

ayah: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
ayah_translit: wa-amma man utiya kitabahu waraa zahrihi
ayah_english: But as for (him) who is given his record behind his back

ayah: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
ayah_translit: wa-amma man utiya kitabahu waraa zahrihi
ayah_english: But as for (him) who is given his record behind his back
Soon he will call (for) destruction
Soon he will call (for) destruction
Soon he will call (for) destruction
And he will burn (in) a Blaze
And he will burn (in) a Blaze
Indeed he had been among his people happy
Indeed he had been among his people happy
Indeed he had been among his people happy
Indeed he had been among his people happy
Indeed he had been among his people happy
Indeed he (had) thought that never he would return
Indeed he (had) thought that never he would return
Indeed he (had) thought that never he would return
Indeed he (had) thought that never he would return
Indeed he (had) thought that never he would return

ayah: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: bala inna rabbahu kana bihi basiran
ayah_english: Nay! Indeed his Lord was of him seeing

ayah: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: bala inna rabbahu kana bihi basiran
ayah_english: Nay! Indeed his Lord was of him seeing

ayah_translit: bala inna rabbahu kana bihi basiran
ayah_english: Nay! Indeed his Lord was of him seeing

ayah: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: bala inna rabbahu kana bihi basiran
ayah_english: Nay! Indeed his Lord was of him seeing

ayah: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: bala inna rabbahu kana bihi basiran
ayah_english: Nay! Indeed his Lord was of him seeing

ayah: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا
ayah_translit: bala inna rabbahu kana bihi basiran
ayah_english: Nay! Indeed his Lord was of him seeing
But nay! I swear by the twilight glow
But nay! I swear by the twilight glow
But nay! I swear by the twilight glow
And the night and what it envelops
And the night and what it envelops
And the night and what it envelops
And the moon when it becomes full
And the moon when it becomes full
And the moon when it becomes full
You will surely embark (to) stage from stage
You will surely embark (to) stage from stage
You will surely embark (to) stage from stage
You will surely embark (to) stage from stage
So what (is) for them not they believe
So what (is) for them not they believe
So what (is) for them not they believe
So what (is) for them not they believe

ayah: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩
ayah_translit: wa-idha quri-a alayhimu al-qur'anu la yasjuduna
ayah_english: And when is recited to them the Quran not they prostrate

ayah: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩

ayah_translit: wa-idha quri-a alayhimu al-qur'anu la yasjuduna
ayah_english: And when is recited to them the Quran not they prostrate
Nay! Those who disbelieved deny
Nay! Those who disbelieved deny
Nay! Those who disbelieved deny
Nay! Those who disbelieved deny
And Allah (is) most knowing of what they keep within themselves
And Allah (is) most knowing of what they keep within themselves
And Allah (is) most knowing of what they keep within themselves
And Allah (is) most knowing of what they keep within themselves
So give them tidings of a punishment painful
So give them tidings of a punishment painful
So give them tidings of a punishment painful

ayah: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ
ayah_translit: illa alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati lahum ajrun ghayru mamnunin
ayah_english: Except those who believe and do righteous deeds For them (is) a reward never ending
